text: The Citadel was a 1960 British adaption television miniseries of A.J. Cronin's 1937 novel The Citadel. The series was directed by John Frankau and Peter Graham Scott. It starred Eric Lander, Zena Walker, Elizabeth Shepherd, Noel Harrison, Richard Vernon, Jack May and Zena Walker. Category:Miniseries Category:1960s drama television series Category:British drama television series
title: The Citadel (1960 miniseries)
